titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that public servants should be commended for their dedication and continued service to the United States during Public Service Recognition Week.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that public servants should be commended for their dedication and continued service to the United States during Public Service Recognition Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of Public Service Recognition Week and commends public servants for their contributions.
